content: *suggested yarn & notions* > * green sport weight/double knitting yarn > * red or black or any yarn for mouth > * white felt depending on the quality of your felt you might have to double up so it will look whiter > * two black buttons small > * 4 wooden beads your choice > * poly-fill pattern was translated by fruaspen into ** swedish 1 ** 1 http //www lindas-hemligheter blogspot fi/2012/12/sma-grodorna-sma-grodorna-ar-lustiga html
